content:
Getting back in the editing mood... but my FHIR build fails with
[java] ERROR @ org.hl7.fhir.igtools.tests.AllGuidesTests: testIg40(org.hl7.fhir.igtools.tests.AllGuidesTests): Unknown FHIRVersion code '3.6.0' (src = Publisher)
Hi @John Moehrke , this would be better in the IG Creation stream...
it is not an IG. it is FHIR core
Oh, sorry, I misunderstood, but this is still the Announce stream, should only contain things that everyone needs to know.
Actually, there's an active topic on this: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179165-committers/topic/build.20failing
